about_the_game:
Yuki Sakurano is on a winning streak as an illegal fighter in underground arenas. One day, the legendary fighter named King comes into her life to scout her as a fighter. Little did Yuki know that this event would drastically change her life in very different ways than she was expecting.

Princess Burst is an interactive game that relies on QTE (Quick Time Events) for its battles. Collect points from your match, and use them to upgrade Yuki’s stats and unlock skills that will help her on her road to ultimate victory!

Choice Matters

During the gameplay, there will be moments where decisions have to be made. This will both affect the story as you play, as well as determines which of the different endings you will ultimately achieve. Try your best to achieve the best possible ending for Yuki, or see what other fates might lay in store for her, the choice is yours!

Progression

Fighting in matches will unlock points. These can be used to upgrade Yuki’s stats and to unlock new skills that she can use in combat.

Free Battle

Once the story has been completed Free Battle Mode will be unlocked where Yuki can keep testing her mettle in endless battles!

Achievements

The game has its own achievements in the form of Titles. These Titles can be unlocked by reaching certain points in the story, or achieving certain milestones in the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are over 21 years old.

The game contains explicit adult themes, including nudity, violence, non-consensual sex and sexual assault.

name: Princess Burst

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce™ GTX 640 series or similar
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core™ i7-4600M or similar
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Drogen
Derbe Sprache

short_description: Princess Burst is an interactive (QTE gameplay) wrestling fighting game. Join Yuki Sakurano as she fights in illegal underground wrestling matches as she aims to climb to the very top!
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
